scripts.build: parcel build src/ui/popup.html src/ui/background.js src/ui/content.js --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ --no-content-hash && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -R src/icons dist/ && cp -R src/models dist/
scripts.watch: parcel watch src/ui/popup.html src/ui/background.js src/ui/content.js --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ --no-content-hash && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -R src/icons dist/ && cp -R src/models dist/
